intro: Psychotria babatwoensis, commonly known as the Babatwönsi Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, particularly Cameroon and Nigeria. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale pink flowers. It is often found in humid, lowland forests and is known for its ornamental value. Due to habitat loss, it is considered vulnerable and requires conservation efforts to ensure its survival.
